sentences.english: It took some time to develop a central money-marking business.
sentences.chinese: 这使得建立和发展中央货币制造业颇费了一些时间。

sentences.english: Want to talk about the manufacturing industry of Zi rich, can talk about 3 night on 3 days.
sentences.chinese: 要谈淄博的制造业，可以谈上三天三夜。

sentences.english: Compared to the pre-MBA survey, the percentage of working in manufacturing industry basically unchanged.
sentences.chinese: 与入学前相比，制造业的比例基本保持不变。

sentences.english: The city has long been a center for the manufacture of textiles, lace, and hosiery.
sentences.chinese: 这城市长期为纺织，花边和针织内衣的制造业中心。

sentences.english: The chief accountant of a manufacturing group.
sentences.chinese: 一个制造业集团的总会计师。

sentences.english: Understand the problems arised the global transformation of industry.
sentences.chinese: 了解制造业的全球转移而引发的各种问题。

sentences.english: Is the energy and heavy chemical industry base and production base for equipment manufacturing industry.
sentences.chinese: 是全国能源重化工基地和装备制造业生产基地。

sentences.english: This time it was those in the business-jet industry who cringed .
sentences.chinese: 这回变乖的是商务机制造业的老板们了。

sentences.english: But he said erosion of the U.S. manufacturing base 'is irreversible.
sentences.chinese: 但他说，美国制造业基础的侵蚀是不可逆转的。

sentences.english: The first represented a shift from agriculture to manufacturing.
sentences.chinese: 第一次巨变是从农业向制造业的转移。

sentences.english: Manufacturing industry of the heavy equipments is major pillar of the national economy.
sentences.chinese: 重大型装备制造业是国民经济的重要支柱。

sentences.english: Purchasing managers in manufacturing firms also report mounting orders.
sentences.chinese: 在制造业公司的采购经理们也报告了订单数的回升。

sentences.english: Servitization is one of the development movements in modern manufacturing.
sentences.chinese: 服务化是当今世界制造业发展趋势之一。

sentences.english: Of course, what Guangdong does best is to produce.
sentences.chinese: 众目所知，广东省最出色的就是生产制造业。

sentences.english: Manufacturer of electronic musical instruments and digital recording products.
sentences.chinese: 制造业者电子的音乐乐器和数位录音的产品。

sentences.english: Discusses the method of modeling of blank holding groove in cool press craft process in mechanical manufacturing industry.
sentences.chinese: 探讨机械制造业冷冲压工艺中的压边条三维建模方法。
